synopsis: The Miyagi Prefecture Qualifier finals of the Spring High School Volleyball Tournament. The ones to stand before Karasuno High School are the undefeated champions, Shiratorizawa Academy. Do they have a chance to win against the ultimate spiker, Ushijima? Their battle towards the nationals finally begins...

The Miyagi Prefecture Qualifier finals of the Spring High School Volleyball Tournament. From the very beginning of the match, Ushijima attacks with his powerful spikes. Because he's not used to left-handed attacks, their Guardian Deity, Nishinoya, has a hard time receiving them. What is Karasuno's plan to deal with the mounting point difference?

The match is now in the second match. Karasuno tries to attack, but Shiratorizawa's middle blocker, Tendo keeps blocking all of their attempts. As he blocked Karasuno's spikes on after another, Tsukishima calmly stared at their opponent's side of the court..

The last part of the 2nd set. Karasuno comes back at Shiratorizawa with Tsukishima and Nishinoya's total defense. They end up in a heated battle in the end, resulting in multiple deuces... Who will score the final point?

Both teams manage to take a set each as they start the third set. Since they were able to stop Ushijima, Karasuno tries to stay on that wave. But Shiratorizawa's setter, Shirabu, seems unfazed by the loss of the second set and they are shown why they're called undefeated champions. Meanwhile, Ushijima says something to Hinata and...

Shiratorizawa quickly takes a second set, so Karasuno is now out of chances. However, Hinata ups his defense and the two teams battle it out even more intensely. It seems that things are picking back up for Karasuno, when Kageyama...

The match finally reaches the final set, which will be won by whoever gets 15 points first. Keishin sees that Kageyama is exhausted, and switches him out with Sugawara. Sugawara had always only done attacks that he knew would work for sure, but after the Tokyo training camp...
